sentences.en: Company bosses have come back down to earth with a bump after a period of post-election euphoria.
sentences.cn: 公司老板们在经历了一段选举过后的兴奋之后，重又回到现实中来。

sentences.en: He was in the grip of a permanent euphoria.
sentences.cn: 他患了一种慢性欣快症.

sentences.en: His mood oscillates between euphoria and depression.
sentences.cn: 他的心情在幸福感与沮丧的两极端间游移((一下心花怒放,一下又变得愁眉苦脸)).

sentences.en: In contrast to their pessimism, I myself was feeling a remarkable euphoria.
sentences.cn: 与他们的悲观情绪相反, 我却感到异常欣快.

sentences.en: Once the euphoria surrounding this victory subsides, reality must return.
sentences.cn: 这场胜利的喜悦退去后，人们将不得不回归现实。

sentences.en: She was still in a state of euphoria hours after her victory.
sentences.cn: 她获胜后几小时仍喜气洋洋.

sentences.en: So after a period of euphoria, the bond market tumbled.
sentences.cn: 因此,经过一段繁荣期后, 债券市场狂泻下来.

sentences.en: The euphoria is giving way to a more sober assessment of the situation.
sentences.cn: 兴高采烈的情绪不见了，取而代之的是对局面更为清醒的认识。

sentences.en: The euphoria of victory in 1945 had long since given way to sullen resentment.
sentences.cn: 1945年胜利时的欢快心情早已被阴郁的不满情绪所取代.

sentences.en: The study underscores the importance of separating euphoria from genuine happiness.
sentences.cn: 这项研究强调出了陶醉和真正快乐区分开的重要性.

sentences.en: There was a general atmosphere of pessimism after the euphoria of last year.
sentences.cn: 去年的狂喜过后出现了普遍的悲观气氛。

sentences.en: There was euphoria after the elections.
They can inspire euphoria, but can also induce dependency.
sentences.cn: 它们能让人兴奋, 但也能导致依赖.

sentences.en: They were in a state of euphoria after the baby was born.
sentences.cn: 孩子出生后,他们沉醉在狂喜之中.

sentences.en: This mushy spot explains the euphoria. Question is, what's causing the mush?
sentences.cn: 模糊解释了异常欣快问题是, 什么导致了区域模糊?
“ 惬意 ” 这个词儿是不是贴切?

words.tran_cn: 精神欢快，[临床]欣快；兴高采烈；欣快症；幸福愉快感
